name: @adobe/reactor-packager
description: Command line utility for packaging a Launch extension into a zip file.

scripts.ready-test-directory: echo "preparing test output directory" && shx rm -rf test-dist && shx mkdir test-dist
scripts.ready-circular-dependency-directory: shx rm -rf tasks/test/circular-extension && shx mkdir tasks/test/circular-extension
scripts.package-for-testing: npm run ready-test-directory && npm run ready-circular-dependency-directory && ./tasks/test/createBundles.js
